Class RemotingHeader

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRemotingHeader

    public class RemotingHeader
extends Object
implements IRemotingHeader
    Remoting header to be sent to a server.

    The Red5 Project, Joachim Bauch (jojo@struktur.de)
